metadata.title: CVE-2021-45450 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Mbed TLS before 2.28.0 and 3.x before 3.1.0, psa_cipher_generate_iv and psa_cipher_encrypt allow policy bypass or oracle-based decryption when the output buffer is at memory locations accessible to an untrusted application.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
